intro: Psychotria rubens, commonly known as the red psychotria, is a flowering plant native to the tropical regions of South America. It produces small, red berries that contain the seeds. Psychotria rubens is often found in humid, shaded environments such as rainforests and is sometimes used in traditional medicine.
